tha-ap542:8.4: daḷhaṁ kaṇhāsi sā → daḷhaṁ kaṇhā siyā (si); ḍayhakaṇhā silā (sya1ed, sya2ed); daḷhakaṇhā siyā (pts-vp-pli1)
tha-ap542:25.3: Diṭṭhiṁ no → diṭṭhiṁ ne (bj); diṭṭhaṁ no (si); diṭṭhinte (sya1ed, sya2ed); diṭṭhi no (pts-vp-pli1)
tha-ap542:30.4: vātarogehi pīḷito → vācāyābhisupīḷito (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1); vātarogī supīḷito (mr)
